nodes.text: Demtri was a Human male who was a member of a cult of Dark Jedi living in Andeddu's Keep on Prakith known as the Malevolence.

When Darth Wyyrlok III appeared at the Keep to learn Darth Andeddu's secrets, Demtri and his fellow Dark Jedi confronted the Sith Lord. They were, however, no match for Wyyrlok's mastery of the Force and, under the influence of a Force illusion, Gerlun struck down Demtri.
